verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

By <S%H422>swearing,<s%> and <S%H3584>lying,<s%> and <S%H7523>killing,<s%> and <S%H1589>stealing,<s%> and committing <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> they break <S%H6555>out,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein shall <S%H535>languish,<s%> with the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and with the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> yea, the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be taken <S%H622>away.<s%>

Yet <S%H389><s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7378>strive,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H376>another:<s%> for thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are as they that <S%H7378>strive<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

Therefore shalt thou <S%H3782>fall<s%> in the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> thy <S%H517>mother.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for <S%H4480>lack<s%> <S%H1097><s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> I will also <S%H3988>reject<s%> thee, that thou shalt be no <S%H4480>priest<s%> <S%H3547><s%> to me: seeing thou hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1121>children.<s%>
As they were <S%H7231>increased,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me: therefore will I <S%H4171>change<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
They eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H5375>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> like <S%H5971>people,<s%> like <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7725>reward<s%> them their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

For they shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> have <S%H7646>enough:<s%> they shall commit <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6555>increase:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have left <S%H5800>off<s%> to take <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H853><s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Whoredom <S%H2184><s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> take <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> ask <S%H7592>counsel<s%> at their <S%H6086>stocks,<s%> and their <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5046>declareth<s%> unto them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> hath caused them to <S%H8582>err,<s%> and they have gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H437>oaks<s%> and <S%H3839>poplars<s%> and <S%H424>elms,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> thereof is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall commit <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> and your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> shall commit <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>

I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they commit <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> nor your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they commit <S%H5003>adultery:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>themselves<s%> are <S%H6504>separated<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H2181>whores,<s%> and they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H6948>harlots:<s%> therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> that doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall.<s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> play the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> yet let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H816>offend;<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> ye unto <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> go ye <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1007>Beth-aven,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> slideth <S%H5637>back<s%> as a <S%H5637>backsliding<s%> <S%H6510>heifer:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them as a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a large <S%H4800>place.<s%>

Their <S%H5435>drink<s%> is <S%H5493>sour:<s%> they have committed whoredom <S%H2181>continually:<s%> <S%H2181><s%> her <S%H4043>rulers<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%> do <S%H157>love,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> ye.
The <S%H7307>wind<s%> hath bound her <S%H6887>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> in her <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> because of their <S%H4480>sacrifices.<s%> <S%H2077><s%>
